thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Janette
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Janette

author: Janette
title: Janette
text: I had been looking for a pair of discontinued frames for ages and had already been scammed by one website, but my optometrist suggested Vision Direct and voila, they had the frames, sent in a timely manner and was able to get a refund on Medicare. Very Happy
